snippet.title: Time Turned Official Trailer - Time Travel Indie Game
snippet.description:
The official trailer for the upcoming indie game Time Turned is finally here! 
Wishlist the game on Steam: store.steampowered.com/app/2877110/Time_Turned/
Play the demo now: gamejolt.com/games/Automagickal-TimeTurned/904208
Time Turned Releases on July 31st 2024

Time Turned is a time-bending puzzle game where you use time clones to solve puzzles that would otherwise be impossible to complete alone.

You are the newest recruit to a world-famous organization of secret agents. With the time-bending stopwatch provided to you, you must work alongside past versions of yourself to solve puzzles and advance deeper into the secret lair of the evil Dr. Ineptus. Will you be able to foil his latest scheme before he sees his nefarious plot to completion?

The Organization's mystical stopwatch can freeze time, rewind it, and even create time clones. Thse temporal companions are perfect copies of the player that will replicate whatever the player has done taken since the beginning of each level. Cleverly utilizing these clones is essential to solving many of the challenges Time Turned presents.
